test_case = int(raw_input())
for i in range(test_case):
	size = int(raw_input())
	pie = map(int, raw_input().split())
	rack = map(int,raw_input().split())
	pie.sort()
	rack.sort()
	total = 0
	for p in range(len(pie)):
		for r in range(len(rack)):
			if pie[p] <= rack[r]:
				total += 1
				rack[r] = 0
				break
	print total
